nav.solidarity: We stand in solidarity with Palestine

hero.subHeadingTxt: Useful tools to perform the action you are looking for, all in one place.

services.paragraph: We offer different tools (mini apps) like: password generator, different units conversion,image resizer and much more! All of this in one place, without the need to search the internet.085208520852Also all of this services are free. In this way you can shorten to much time from your daily work, without the need to search for a specific tool on the internet. Simply come to our web and more likely that tool can be found on our catalog!085208520852Then, what are you waiting for?! Go to the navigation menu and click Tools to continue. If you want to plan your day click Task.

about.paragraph: I'm a passionate front-end web developer dedicated to my craft. Sincerity and quality are my basic principles.I approach each project with the goal of producing a high-performing, SEO-friendly, and accessible website / web App with an good UI/UX design.085208520852I adhere to industry best practices to ensure your project's success InshaaAllah.

tools.headingTxt: Necessary tools, all in one place!
tools.infoTxt: Click to use that specific tool.
tools.openError: There was a problem opening this tool!

firstPanel.informationText: We need this information to make changes to the tasks when deadline you give them pass based on your area times!. If you don't provide this information, you will need to manually change tasks state, even if time to complete the task pass.We use the Islamic calendar.

axios.others: We encountered a problem trying to save configurations!

secondPanel.bottomInfoText: Click on task to edit, delete, or to change it state. Warning! Complete the task before time pass, otherwise task will fail InshaaAllah.
secondPanel.noTasksText: There are no tasks for the moment!
